ClientSerializeServerDeserialize
open /SystemWebExtensionsAUT/Sys.Net.JsonSerialization/ClientSerializeServerDeserialize.aspx
click ClientButtonID
assertText ClientResultID {"message":"client default color is Black","rgb":["00","00","00"]}
click ServerButtonID
waitForText ServerResultID client default color is Black: 000000
select ColorSelectID label=Green
assertText ClientResultID {"message":"client color is Green","rgb":["00","FF","00"]}
click ServerButtonID
waitForText ServerResultID client color is Green: 00FF00
